telephony_line_calls_time_condition_load: Oops! An error occurred while loading the time conditions.
telephony_line_calls_time_condition_info: Set the slots that your line is available, and set the forwarding settings to apply while the line is unavailable.
You can set your exceptional closing days on this page.
telephony_line_calls_time_condition_save: Your time conditions have been modified.
Oops! An error occurred while saving the time condition options.
telephony_line_calls_time_condition_help: First, configure your redirections by clicking on one of the in the “Configure your redirections” section.
either to one of your OVHcloud VoIP lines or numbers,
or to an external number outside of OVHcloud
or to the voicemail on one of your VoIP lines.
Next, show your availability by clicking and dragging on the schedule to set the time conditions during which you are available on your VoIP line.

Finally, you can set the type of redirection to apply outside of the time conditions that you have created. By default, outside the time conditions, calls will be automatically redirected to the voicemail of your VoIP line.
telephony_line_calls_time_condition_para: Enable call redirecting depending on the time condition
Time period before the switch to "outside time condition" if the redirection cannot be completed
